table.name: address
table.comments: Address lines (line_1, line_2, line_3) follow UK postal addressing conventions. This is a fixed, bounded set — not an unbounded repeating group — so separate columns are preferred over a child table. The 'incrementing column names' anomaly for this table is a known false positive.
